entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is described as someone who has gotten drenched and is trying to shake off the worst out of his eyes. He is also nervous about Stinksap being poisonous.

entities.name: stinksap
entities.description: Stinksap is mentioned as a substance that Neville claims is not poisonous.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who has spat out a mouthful of Stinksap and is trying to clean his glasses. He is also the one being greeted by Cho Chang in the doorway.

entities.name: cho chang
entities.description: Cho Chang is introduced as the Seeker on the Ravenclaw Quidditch team and is described as a pretty girl with long, shiny black hair. She greets Harry in the doorway but quickly departs.

entities.name: trevor
entities.description: Trevor is mentioned as someone whose hand Harry uses to wipe his glasses.

entities.name: ravenclaw quidditch team
entities.description: The Ravenclaw Quidditch team is introduced as the team that Cho Chang is a part of.

relationships.description: Harry has been exposed to Stinksap, which he spat out onto the floor.
Neville has also been exposed to Stinksap and is trying to reassure Harry that it's not poisonous.
Cho Chang greets Harry in the doorway, but quickly departs.
